name: Line Them Up
description:
LD37 Jam Entry

Controls:

  • Space Bar: Swap between modes
  • Player Mode:
    • Arrow keys: Move
    • X Shoot
    • C strafe
  • Tetris Mode:
    • Arrow Keys
    • Arrow Up - "Drop" the block to the bottom
    • X/C rotate block

Changelog:

16 December 2016

  • Added Mode Indicator
  • Fixed (?) Chrome Scrolling + Pixelation
  • Gain more shots from combos

11 December 2016

  • Initial Jam Release
